question: Which IT major is set to acquire 100% stake in Postbank Systems AG?
explanation:
Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) is set to acquire 100% of the shares of Postbank Systems AG, which provides IT services to Deutsche Bank.
Postbank Systems AG is a German based IT firm. By this acquisition, around 1500 employees of Postbank System would become a part of Tata Consultancy Services (TCS).
